titleStmt.title: A letter to a peer of the Church of England clearing a point touched in a sermon preached at Chester, before His Most Sacred Majesty, on the 28th of August, in answer to a post-script joyned unto the answer to Nubes testium.
titleStmt.author: Sabran, Lewis, 1652-1732.

notesStmt.note: Signed: Lewis Sabran, Priest of the Society of Jesus.
Imperfect: tightly bound with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
